response.overview: Coinbase refunds are limited and depend on the transaction type. 1 ⛓ 888 ⛓ 634 ⛓ 2381 While payment errors or billing issues.1 ⛓ 888 ⛓ 634 ⛓ 2381  may qualify for review, confirmed cryptocurrency transfers cannot be reversed.
